profile.summary:
hello people who are viewing my profile to either praise or hate on it because im a furry.......if your a hater then why are you even reading this? anyways......if your with me or my friend thank you. i like to play gmod tower because its really fun........some may not agree but.....big deal......just another hater right? and another game i love to play is mirrors edge its acctualy inspired me to try and be a runner.......however im not that fit to be a runner :( but hey.....i can still try right? if you dont like my opinion of intrest of being a furry then you can fuck off because i dont listen to ignorant haters that what to make people feel bad just to make themselves feel better about theyre shitty lives..........(too much? nah......i dont think so bullying is not cool so im just stating a point of how almost everyone on the internet are assholes :/)
